app.name: Dream to App
app.slogan: We turn your dreams into reality

nextjs.title: Next.js
nextjs.description: A powerful framework for building server-rendered React applications, enabling fast and optimized web apps.

nodejs.title: Node.js
nodejs.description: A JavaScript runtime that allows for building scalable network applications, perfect for backend services.

react.title: React
react.description: A popular JavaScript library for creating interactive user interfaces with reusable components.

reactNative.title: React Native
reactNative.description: A framework for building mobile applications using React, enabling native apps for iOS and Android.

mongoDB.title: MongoDB
mongoDB.description: A NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents, designed for scalability.

firebase.title: Firebase
firebase.description: A platform by Google for building mobile and web apps, offering tools for real-time databases and authentication.

aws.title: AWS
aws.description: A comprehensive cloud computing platform that provides a wide range of services for hosting applications.

prisma.title: Prisma
prisma.description: An open-source database toolkit that simplifies database access for Node.js applications.

login.mustLogin: You must login to add a question

contactUsPage.hint: Correct information is required to help us respond as quickly as possible, providing the best possible service.
contactUsPage.sendButton: Send .. We are waiting for you
contactUsPage.name: Name

notFound.description: The page you are looking for is not found

homepage.fromIdeaContent: We turn bold ideas into powerful digital solutions that captivate users and transform businesses. From concept to launch, we craft innovative products that people love and businesses can’t live without. By blending creativity, cutting-edge technology, and strategic vision, we create experiences that stand out, scale fast, and deliver real results. When you’re ready to disrupt, grow, and lead, we’re here to make it happen.
homepage.fromIdeaButton: Let’s bring your vision to life. Get started today!
homepage.discoverContent: Together, we dive deep into understanding the problem, uncovering hidden opportunities, and generating impactful ideas. No vision is too ambitious—every big idea starts with a simple prototype. By validating concepts early, we ensure that our direction is aligned with your goals and user needs. This stage sets the foundation for creating solutions that are not only innovative but also practical and effective.
homepage.discoverButton: Ready to explore? Let’s get started!

mobileAppPhases.discoveryPlanningDescription: Define project goals, target audience, and requirements. Create a roadmap and wireframes.
mobileAppPhases.uiUxDesignDescription: Design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces. Create prototypes and gather feedback.
mobileAppPhases.developmentDescription: Build the mobile application using modern frameworks and technologies. Ensure scalability and performance.
mobileAppPhases.testingQADescription: Conduct rigorous testing to identify and fix bugs. Ensure the app meets quality standards.
mobileAppPhases.deploymentDescription: Launch the app on app stores (Google Play, Apple App Store). Ensure smooth deployment and monitoring.
mobileAppPhases.maintenanceUpdatesDescription: Provide ongoing support, fix issues, and release updates to keep the app relevant and functional.
mobileAppPhases.userFeedbackIterationDescription: Gather user feedback and iterate on the app to improve features and user experience.

footer.chatWithUs: Chat with us for instant support

services.blendingCreativity: Blending creativity and technology to craft bespoke strategies for your needs.
services.websiteDevelopmentDescription: Transform your online presence with custom websites designed to captivate and convert.
services.mobileAppDevelopmentDescription: Empowering businesses with innovative, user-friendly mobile apps for iOS and Android.
services.crmDevelopmentDescription: Streamline operations and enhance customer engagement with tailored CRM solutions.
services.ecommerceDevelopmentDescription: Create seamless, sales-driven online stores that enhance customer experience and boost revenue.
services.uiUxDesignDescription: Craft intuitive and visually stunning user interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences.
services.digitalMarketingDescription: Boost your online presence with data-driven digital marketing strategies tailored to your business goals.
services.visualIdentityDescription: Create a cohesive and memorable brand identity that resonates with your audience.

whyChooseUs.costEfficiencyDescription: Derive up to 30% business savings with our competitive offerings
whyChooseUs.onDemandDescription: Choose the best fit remote team as your business demands
whyChooseUs.itExpertsDescription: Scale up with engineers skilled across various technologies
whyChooseUs.timeFlexibilityDescription: Assure a minimum of 4 hours of overlap for effective teamwork
whyChooseUs.securePrivacyDescription: Achieve success with NDA & ISMS certification

description.JavaScript: A versatile scripting language for web development.
description.HTML: The standard markup language for creating web pages.
description.CSS: A style sheet language for designing web pages.
description.React: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
description.Next_js: A React framework for server-rendered applications.
description.Node_js: A runtime environment for executing JavaScript on the server.
description.Firebase: A platform developed by Google for mobile and web applications.
description.ReactNative: A framework for building native apps using React.
description.MySQL: An open-source relational database management system.
description.Photoshop: A graphics editing software developed by Adobe.
description.Illustrator: A vector graphics editor developed by Adobe.
description.SQLite: A self-contained, high-reliability, embedded SQL database engine.
description.TypeScript: A strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript.
description.Prisma: A next-generation ORM for Node.js and TypeScript.
description.Adobe_Xd: A vector-based user experience design tool for web apps and mobile apps.
description.Figma: A web-based vector graphics editor and prototyping tool.
description.Sentry: A platform for monitoring and fixing crashes in real-time.
description.Twilio: A cloud communications platform as a service.
description.Shopify: A platform for building e-commerce websites.

power.JavaScript: Essential for creating dynamic and interactive web applications.
power.HTML: Forms the backbone of web content structure.
power.CSS: Brings beauty and visual appeal to web designs.
power.React: Empowers developers to create fast and modular front-end applications.
power.Next_js: Enables server-side rendering and static site generation for enhanced performance.
power.Node_js: Supports scalable and high-performance backend development.
power.MongoDB: Flexible and scalable database solution for modern applications.
power.Firebase: Simplifies backend development with authentication, databases, and hosting.
power.ReactNative: Facilitates cross-platform mobile app development with native performance.
power.MySQL: Reliable and robust database system for structured data.
power.Photoshop: Industry-standard for photo editing and digital design.
power.Illustrator: Perfect for creating logos, illustrations, and scalable vector art.
power.SQLite: Lightweight and fast database engine for embedded systems.
power.TypeScript: Enhances code quality and development experience with type safety.
power.Prisma: Simplifies database access with intuitive and type-safe APIs.
power.Adobe_Xd: Streamlines design and prototyping workflows for UX designers.
power.Figma: Enables collaborative and cloud-based design workflows.
power.Sentry: Empowers developers to debug and fix issues faster.
power.Twilio: Seamlessly integrates messaging and communication APIs.
power.Shopify: Simplifies e-commerce store creation and management.
